    io.helidon.common.serviceloader

    • Uses of HelidonServiceLoader in io.helidon.common.mapper

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static MapperManager.Builder MapperManager.builder​(HelidonServiceLoader<MapperProvider> serviceLoader)
      Create a fluent API builder to create a customized mapper manager based on the provided Helidon Service loader.
      static MapperManager MapperManager.create​(HelidonServiceLoader<MapperProvider> serviceLoader)
      Create a mapper manager using only the provided Helidon Service loader.
